name: Ball Escape (itch) (Anwar A.)
description:
a Puzzle game where your goal is to reach the hole by opening doors and platforms, but it's not that easy.

you control all the objects at the same time, allowing for various approaches to solving the puzzle.

The game contains 4 different puzzles with an exclusive mechanic "REWIND", and with a new upcoming game mode "Story mode" with 4 new puzzles, so keep a look out for em :D.
